problem_names: lemma in_progress_dom [elim]: "in_progress (r R) x \<Longrightarrow> R \<in> dom r"
lemma in_progress_Some [elim]: "in_progress r x \<Longrightarrow> \<exists> x. r = Some x"
lemma in_progressS_elt [elim]: "in_progressS r S \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> in_progress r x"
translations: lemma in_progress_dom [elim]: "in_progress (r R) x \<Longrightarrow> R \<in> dom r"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. in_progress (r R) x \<Longrightarrow> R \<in> dom r
lemma in_progress_Some [elim]: "in_progress r x \<Longrightarrow> \<exists> x. r = Some x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. in_progress r x \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>x. r = Some x
lemma in_progressS_elt [elim]: "in_progressS r S \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> in_progress r x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>in_progressS r S; x \<in> S\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> in_progress r x
